ovdesc.p: The FATCA.TAX.STATUS table is used to record the different FATCA statuses or account classifications. A status can be used in FATCA CUSTOMER SUPPLEMENTARY INFO only after a record is created here for the classification.

desc.p: This field contains a description of the status.

Identifies any additional element which has been defined locally to meet a particular requirement.

As in the majority of T24 Applications, the User is allowed to define in the up to 999 Local elements in addition to the standard fields previously specified. These local elements should be defined by the User where deemed necessary according to local practice.
The name of the new element(s), as well as the Format and Validation Rules, must be defined in the Local Tables and LOCAL.REF.TABLE prior to their use in the FATCA.PARAMETER application.

This field is to record the status number for the classification, this is used in determining the FATCA.STATUS of the joint portfolio.
When a TAX type of CUSTOMER.RELATIONSHIP record is linked to the portfolio (SEC.ACC.MASTER), then a FATCA.CUSTOMER.SUPPLEMENTARY.INFO will be updated for the customer relationship id.
PORTFOLIO.STATUS will be the highest level classification of FATCA.STATUS among the joint customers in the customer relationship record.
